content:
```text
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(3.0, -73.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (3.0, -73.0)
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, -71.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items when there are no items
 -  Make sure you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity
### Errors when extracting from a chest which does not have the item
 -  Make sure the chest has the item you are trying to extract before attempting to extract
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Ensure you have all the ingredients required to craft an item before attempting to craft it. Stone is a raw resource that must be gathered first before crafting stone furnaces.
### Errors when accessing status on an integer
- Ensure you are calling the status property on an entity and not an integer.

NAMESPACE
- Prototype: Type
- Direction: Type
- EntityStatus: Type
- insert_item(item: Prototype, entity: Entity, quantity: int) -> bool
  - Failure: No item to insert from your inventory.
  - Success: Item inserted into entity.
- extract_item(item: Prototype, entity: Entity, quantity: int) -> int
  - Failure: Could not find a valid entity containing the item.
  - Success: Item extracted from entity.
- craft_item(item: Prototype, quantity: int) -> bool
  - Failure: Missing ingredients.
  - Success: Item crafted.
- place_entity(item: Prototype, position: Position) -> Entity
  - Failure: Entity already exists at the target position.
- place_entity_next_to(item: Prototype, position: Position, direction: Direction) -> Entity
  - Failure: Cannot place entity at the position due to collision with existing entities.
- new_drill: Entity
- furnace: Entity
- new_chest: Entity
- extracted_iron_ore_new: int
- extracted_iron_ore_old: int
```
